original_title: Tôn-Thât Tiêt… et coule la rivière…
overview: An intimate portrait of the man, the composer, and his connection to the two rivers of his life: the Sông Hương (Perfume River) in his home city of Huế, and the Marne River near Paris, where he has been living for nearly four decades.
title: Tôn-Thât Tiêt… and the River Flows...
